rows.label: tev041001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Sevvy about Prone history.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Sevvy about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Sevvy what he did during the attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Sevvy what he will do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Sevvy about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0001
rows.name:
Our clan was blessed by soil and trees.
We lived as one with life around us.
This is why we became Tree Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0002
rows.name:
But our enemies mined rocks. Mastered metal.
Used gunpowder. They became Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0003
rows.name:
Our two clans fought for most of Prone history.
But balance was always kept.
Neither could end the other.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0004
rows.name:
But then Ganglion allied with Cavern Clan.
Changed everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0005
rows.name:
They destroyed more than lives and homes.
They destroyed our history.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0009
rows.name:
Brave warrior! You saved my son.
I thank you with all that I am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0010
rows.name:
But I wish another favor. Speak to my Prone kin.
Help them as you helped me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0011
rows.name:
Our people hunt to eat. War with Cavern Clan to live.
It has been this way for 10,000 suns.
It is only life we know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0012
rows.name:
Your city is strange to us. Old ways do not hold.
Problems are bound to arise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0013
rows.name:
As chieftain, I try to stop problems.
But I am also new to this place.
I can only do so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0014
rows.name: I need help from someone who knows city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0015
rows.name: Will you aid us? You will be rewarded. This I swear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0020
rows.name:
Weapons or no, we were ready to fight at your side.
But Stella talked us out of it. So we sheltered instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0021
rows.name:
It shamed me to watch you fight alone.
To not repay you for saving my kin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0022
rows.name:
But Stella was right. Prone would have been destroyed.
Children and future would have been slaughtered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0023
rows.name:
But we will not be burden for Earth aliens.
If we cannot fight, we will work instead.
Please let strength of mighty Prone aid you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0028
rows.name:
Earth alien! You vanquished Ganglion!
I knew you could do this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0029
rows.name: Never again will we live in fear of their yoke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0030
rows.name: You ask what I do next? I never dared consider it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0031
rows.name:
But others of our kin might still not be free.
They may be held by Ganglion's masters.
Held by Samaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG0032
rows.name: I hope you help me free them if that day comes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG1001
rows.name:
My son is gone, brave warrior. Yet his friends live still.
I thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG1002
rows.name:
But I wish another favor. Speak to my Prone kin.
Help them as you helped me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG1003
rows.name:
Our people hunt to eat. War with Cavern Clan to live.
It has been this way for 10,000 suns.
It is only life we know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG1004
rows.name:
Your city is strange to us. Old ways do not hold.
Problems are bound to arise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG1005
rows.name:
As chieftain, I try to stop problems.
But I am also new to this place.
I can only do so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG1006
rows.name: I need help from someone who knows city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev041001_MSG1007
rows.name:
Will you aid us? I do not wish my son's fate on
any more Prone.[ST:wait ]
